text:
Dear all,
if you are interested in having a better L-sheet community and keeping alive this Wild-sheet experiment, please, keep reading.

 Briefly, this Wild-sheet Slack is a bit too quiet /dead..; reasons are many (including that some of the starting organizers have changed field/interest/job..). Me and Helena Coker (and surely others) feel that having a stronger L-sheet community would help and this Slack is a good platform (but not the only one); surely we need to put in some effort and maybe get new ideas.

One (sad) option is closing down this Slack (we should actually pay to keep old messages accessible); but also a re-vitalization (new activities? Journal clubs? Virtual demo? New people? Reduce the channels?) or a re-direction (just a mailing list? A virtual conference? A monthly Zoom meeting?) is possible.

 *Would you like to help to decide the future of the Wild-sheet?* 

We invite you to a Zoom meeting with the following simple goal: decide the future of this Slack (and, why not, share glimpses of current exciting light-sheet projects going on).
Would you like to join the Zoom meeting? Which day you prefer? Please fill the doodle by *Thursday 2nd of March*
<https://doodle.com/meeting/participate/id/bmqmOm9b/vote>

Hope to see you on-line! And If we are just a few, it will be already useful;
Have good imaging!

Alessandro and Helena

PS: if you prefer to share your opinion via text, you are also welcome to write your comments on Slack
